meanings.definition: A universal solvent or substance capable of dissolving any other substance.
meanings.sent1: The alcahest was so powerful that it could dissolve even the toughest materials.
meanings.sent2: Chemists use alcahest to dissolve various substances in their experiments.
meanings.sent3: The alcahest accidentally spilled on the table, dissolving everything in its path!
meanings.sent4: Her kindness acted as an emotional alcahest, dissolving all the negativity around her.
meanings.sent5: The alcahest bubbled and hissed as it dissolved the metal bar in seconds.

meanings.definition: A hypothetical substance sought by alchemists for its supposed ability to transform base metals into gold.
meanings.sent1: Legends say that alchemists searched far and wide for the elusive alcahest.
meanings.sent2: The alcahest was believed to hold the key to turning ordinary metals into precious gold.
meanings.sent3: The alcahest was said to be guarded by a mystical dragon in the ancient tales.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like an alcahest, turning her failures into golden opportunities.
meanings.sent5: The alcahest glowed with a mysterious light, promising untold riches to those who found it.
